title: Growth Through Failure: Productive Failure-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic algebra and geometry concepts at the 9th-grade (middle school) level
context.additional_context: Personal digital device utilization, small-group activities via Zoom breakout rooms, real-time feedback provision

learning_goals: Students can propose at least three alternative solution strategies in unstructured mathematical problem situations
Learners experience a process of correcting over 80% of their logical errors through peer feedback
Participants can improve problem-solving approaches by at least two stages through failure case analysis
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
